callback_with_context.context_function_id: IsActive == false && ResourceTransactionContext(GetIfElse(IsContextValid( StoredContextFromParent("CcoCampaignFaction")), StoredContextFromParent("CcoCampaignFaction"), StoredContextFromParent("CcoCampaignSettlement") )).PooledResourceTransactionList.Filter(Value < 0).Size > 0 && (IsAvailable || RitualContext.Category != "ASCENSION_RITUAL") && RitualContext.Category.StartsWith("GREAT_GAME") == false && (RitualContext.Key.Contains("toz_slot_t4_") == false || IsSeatClaimed == false)
RitualContext.Category == "ASCENSION_RITUAL" && IsAvailable == false && IsComplete == false && IsScriptLocked == false

component_text.text: You have already Ascended. This Ascension is no longer possible.
Cannot confederate an existing or disconnected player faction.
Cannot confederate This faction was already confederated by another player.

callback_with_context.context_function_id: Format({this | StoredContextFromParent("CcoCampaignRitual").IsSeatClaimedByPlayer => Loc("toz_cost_to_usurp_seat_others") | StoredContextFromParent("CcoCampaignRitual").IsSeatClaimed => Loc("toz_cost_to_usurp_seat_player") | Loc("toz_cost_to_claim_seat") }, Name, Icon, AbsoluteValue)

component_text.text: This seat was recently usurped from you.
